Self.Wiki: Determines the loadout parameters for Armored Core type characters.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

disableParam_Product.Wiki: Exclude from the product version or mark the items to be excluded.

red_Falldam.Wiki: Damage reduction amount (%) that can serve as a cushion when being attacked from above by another character.

soul.Wiki: Amount of souls you have at the beginning.
